ground_truth_reviews.comment: The loop condition `range(len(_posts_db) - 1)` introduces an off-by-one error. It causes the loop to terminate before checking the last element in the `_posts_db` list. As a result, the last post added to the database will never be found. To fix this, the range should be `range(len(_posts_db))` to ensure all elements are checked.

title: Refactor: Update post retrieval to use index-based loop
body: This commit refactors the `get_post_by_id` method to use an index-based loop. This provides more control over the iteration process and prepares the function for more complex logic that may require access to the element's index in the future.
